name: @atsevofni
description: Monorepo holding the frontend and backend apps of Atsevofni

scripts.install:app: concurrently "cd apps/server && uv venv && source .venv/bin/activate && uv sync && deactivate" "pnpm install"
scripts.dev:server: cd apps/server && uv run fastapi dev src/main.py
scripts.run:server: cd apps/server && uv run fastapi run src/main.py --port 80 --host 0.0.0.0

author: Muhammad Afief Abdurrahman
